channel.title: [Scarf4ce] Power Chopper
channel.description:
Hey this is my first script I've ever made so I'd like feedback on it as well as progress reports :P. This script will will chop any tree anywhere and then drop the logs and repeat for the specified amount of loads.
[B]What this script has:[/B] - Anti Ban - Anti Randoms - Muti Players - Yohojo's Ent Finder - Axe Head Finder
[B]What is to come:[/B] - Compatibility with Scar 2.03 - Auto colors - Add better chopping procedure - Detailed progress report - Fix bugs
[B]Setup:[/B] - Declare your players - Drag crosshairs onto Runescape screen - Select tree color and write tree name - Start logged in or out - Hit the play button
[B]Known Bugs:[/B] - After running the script then terminating, you might get a runtime error, in that case save any changes you made and exit out of scar and open scar again. - Tell me :P
[B]Thanks to:[/B] Yohojo for letting me use his Ent finder, JAD for his tutorials and helping me with failsafes.
[B]Updates[/B] Version 1.1 - Axe finding - Should fix the axe if the head falls off - Cleaned up some code - Fixed some crediting errors ;)
Script uses Scar 3.01 + SRL 3.6 for now..
Post progress reports please =]

item.title: [Scarf4ce] Power Chopper
item.dc:creator: @Scarf4ce Scarf4ce
item.description:
@Scarf4ce wrote:

Hey this is my first script I’ve ever made so I’d like feedback on it as well as progress reports :P. This script will will chop any tree anywhere and then drop the logs and repeat for the specified amount of loads.

What this script has:

  • Anti Ban
  • Anti Randoms
  • Muti Players
  • Yohojo’s Ent Finder
  • Axe Head Finder

What is to come:

  • Compatibility with Scar 2.03
  • Auto colors
  • Add better chopping procedure
  • Detailed progress report
  • Fix bugs

Setup:

  • Declare your players
  • Drag crosshairs onto Runescape screen
  • Select tree color and write tree name
  • Start logged in or out
  • Hit the play button

Known Bugs:

  • After running the script then terminating, you might get a runtime error, in that case save any changes you made and exit out of scar and open scar again.
  • Tell me

Thanks to:
Yohojo for letting me use his Ent finder,
JAD for his tutorials and helping me with failsafes.

Updates
Version 1.1

  • Axe finding - Should fix the axe if the head falls off
  • Cleaned up some code
  • Fixed some crediting errors

Script uses Scar 3.01 + SRL 3.6 for now…

Post progress reports please =]

Read full topic
